00030 
00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace pwiz::util;
00033 using namespace pwiz::peptideid;
00034 using namespace pwiz::minimxml::SAXParser;
00035 
00036 ostream* os_;
00037 
00038 const char* samplePepXML =
00039     "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n"
00040     "<msms_pipeline_analysis>\n"
00041     "<msms_run_summary>\n"
00042     "<spectrum_query start_scan=\"1\" end_scan=\"1\" retention_time_sec=\"1.0\">\n"
00043     "<search_result>\n"
00044     "<search_hit peptide=\"ABC\">\n"
00045     "<analysis_result analysis=\"peptideprophet\">\n"
00046     "<peptideprophet_result probability=\"0.900\">\n"
00047     "<search_score_summary>\n"
00048     "</search_score_summary>\n"
00049     "</peptideprophet_result>\n"
00050     "</analysis_result>\n"
00051     "</search_hit>\n"
00052     "</search_result>\n"
00053     "</spectrum_query>\n"
00054     "</msms_run_summary>\n"
00055     "</msms_pipeline_analysis>\n";
00056 
00057 void testIStream()
00058 {
00059     istringstream xml (samplePepXML);
00060 
00061     PeptideID_pepXml ppXml(&xml);
00062 
00063     std::string id("1");
00064     PeptideID::Record bf = ppXml.record(id);
00065 
00066     unit_assert(bf.nativeID == "1");
00067     unit_assert(bf.sequence == "ABC");
00068     unit_assert_equal(bf.normalizedScore, 0.9, 1e-15);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void testFilename()
00072 {
00073     ifstream xml ("test.pep.xml");
00074 
00075     PeptideID_pepXml ppXml(&xml);
00076 
00077 
00078     std::string id("1");
00079     PeptideID::Record bf = ppXml.record(id);
00080 
00081     unit_assert(bf.nativeID == "1");
00082     unit_assert(bf.sequence == "ABC");
00083     unit_assert_equal(bf.normalizedScore, 0.9, 1e-15);
00084 }
00085
